remarks: The vertex degree of a one-edge graph, case 4: an edge from a vertex to itself contributes two to the vertex's degree.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Mar-2015.)  (Revised by Alexander van der Vekens, 22-Dec-2017.)
statement:
vdgr1.1 $e |- ( ph -> V e. _V ) $.
vdgr1.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. _V ) $.
vdgr1.3 $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
vdgr1d $p |- ( ph -> ( ( V VDeg { <. A , { U } >. } ) ` U ) = 2 ) $.
